hero.title: Hi, I'm Blake Tarter.
hero.subtitle: A Kansas City based web developer

aboutMe.title: About Me.
aboutMe.summary: Blake is a Javascript developer with 3+ years of experience planning, creating, and maintaining websites and various application platforms. Some technologies that he uses on a regular basis are React, Angular, and Ionic. His projects include client and consumer facing websites, as well as react-native and hybrid applications. He has experience working in a team environment, exceeds in time management skills, and strives to remain on the cutting-edge of the front-end development scene.

workItems.title: Web Audio Synth

workItems.desc: Extension of React-Native ListView to allow easier pagination.

workItems.title: Morse Code Generator
workItems.desc: Javascript code that turns plain text into Morse Code style dots and dashes.
